text: It looks like Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik just can ’ t quit each other! Over the weekend, Gigi, 23, and Zayn, 25, were spotted kissing and walking arm in arm in New York's SoHo neighborhood, looking more in love than ever! ImageDirect During their romantic outing, Gigi and Zayn even stopped to give gift cards to a homeless man. In March, the two announced they were calling it quits again. He tweeted, “ Gigi and I had an incredibly meaningful, loving and fun relationship and I have a huge amount of respect and adoration for Gigi as a woman and a friend. She has such an incredible soul. I'm grateful to all of our fans for respecting this difficult decision and our privacy at
